AboutUs.heroTitle: The Story of Nab Noghl & Halva
AboutUs.heroSubtitle: Over 30 years of experience in producing the finest traditional Urmia noghl and halva
AboutUs.introContent: Nab Halva Company has been operating since 1991 with over 30 years of experience in producing noghl and various traditional Urmia halva. We offer you the authentic and delicious taste of Urmia halva using the finest ingredients and traditional methods.
AboutUs.missionContent: Our mission is to preserve and pass on the authentic and traditional flavors of Urmia noghl and halva to future generations. We believe that every bite of our products should contain love, precision, and quality.
AboutUs.visionContent: Our vision is to become the most trusted brand for traditional noghl and halva production in Iran and introduce the authentic flavors of Urmia to the world.
AboutUs.qualityContent: All our products are handmade using completely traditional methods, and no preservatives or artificial additives are used in them.
AboutUs.feature2Desc: Production using authentic and traditional Urmia methods
AboutUs.feature3Desc: Using the finest and highest quality raw materials
AboutUs.feature4Desc: Suitable packaging for gifts and storage
AboutUs.teamContent: The Nab Halva team consists of experienced masters and young generation enthusiasts dedicated to preserving authentic traditions. Every team member participates in product manufacturing with love and precision.
AboutUs.historyContent: Nab Halva Company started operations in 1991 with the goal of producing the finest traditional Urmia noghl and halva. Throughout these years, we have always emphasized the quality and authenticity of our products.
AboutUs.certificatesContent: We are proud to have received quality certificates and national standards, and have always been successful in health and quality inspections.
